deep-cleaning.title: Deep Cleaning
deep-cleaning.description: Deep cleaning involves thorough cleaning of all surfaces, corners, and hard-to-reach areas.

carpet-cleaning.title: Carpet Cleaning
carpet-cleaning.description: Carpet cleaning includes vacuuming, spot treatment, and deep steam cleaning.

window-cleaning.title: Window Cleaning
window-cleaning.description: Window cleaning ensures streak-free and sparkling windows inside and out.

office-cleaning.title: Office Cleaning
office-cleaning.description: Office cleaning covers desk sanitization, trash removal, and common area cleaning.
